name: Current RMS Import
author: Qamar Azam

sections.description: Current RMS plugin fetch products from Current Rental Managment System CRM and import in Woocommerce products along categories
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire d_crms folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Current RMS’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire d_crms folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Current RMS’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

short_description: Import from Current RMS(Rental Management System) to Woocommerce products using API.
description: Current RMS plugin fetch products from Current Rental Managment System CRM and import in Woocommerce products along categories
